tests

Class LND5Function

  • java.lang.Object
    • tests.LND5Function
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FunctionIntf

    public class LND5Function
extends java.lang.Object
implements FunctionIntf
    class implements the so-called LND5 function (continuous, non-differentiable). Its global minimum value for n dimensions is fmin = 2(n-1) The function is called "Chained CB3 II" function. See Haarala (2004) and Brimberg et al (2013).

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011

    Company:

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ioannis T. Christou
